comment:
* A class for defining layout directions. A layout direction can be left-to-right (LTR)
 * or right-to-left (RTL). It can also be inherited (from a parent) or deduced from the default
 * language script of a locale.

variables.name: LTR
variables.comment: * Horizontal layout direction is from Left to Right.

variables.name: RTL
variables.comment: * Horizontal layout direction is from Right to Left.

variables.name: LOCALE
variables.comment: * Horizontal layout direction is deduced from the default language script for the locale.
